description:

So we set up an Edge video and as you will see things got out of hand. Well, they usually do, but this time we just kept doing bonus stuff until he nutted.
I of course normally go with trying to make the guys cum at the end, but given that I have done that with him, AND he was so close to cumming from getting cream-pied, I just went with it.
A little POV action too to spice things up!
title: Bryan & Maximilian - Edge RAW
